articles.title: Poland-Belarus border: Asylum-seekers trapped in Eastern Europe by Lukashenko's political chess game - The Globe and Mail
articles.description: An authoritarian Eastern European regime has steered thousands of people fleeing Iraq, Syria and Afghanistan to a frontier where it hopes to annoy its neighbours. Why?

Migrants gather on Nov. 8 near a barbed-wire fence in Belarus's Grodno region on the border between Poland.Leonid Scheglov/BelTA/Handout via REUTERS
